name: Doctor Strange #383
summary: Doctor Strange isn’t getting anywhere taking Loki on by himself, so he’s changing the venue. The former Sorcerer Supreme goes to Asgard for help, and they aren’t exactly welcoming. But don’t worry, Strange didn’t come alone…YOU WON’T BELIEVE WHO GUEST-STARS IN THIS ISSUE!

relations.title: Doctor Strange by Donny Cates Vol. 1: God of Magic
